messages.message: Hi @sean.donohoe. After pulling the latest master, I cannot send API requests in my crafting sandbox (run with `ppy`). There are no logs from `server-nginx` when I send API requests. I've restarted my sandbox and ran `workspace service enable webpack && cs down webpack`
@mfichman would you happen to know whether this could be related to the template changes you made this morning?
@Xindi Xu I'm testing out some stuff in a test sandbox now, but qq why are you running `workspace service enable webpack` if you're developing with ppy?
That's very likely resulting in at least two separate nginx instances getting started in your workspace, which would explain why you don't see logs in your ppy nginx
oh btw, I am facing the same issue with again no logs as well (been working just with ppy)

> but qq why are you running `workspace service enable webpack`
i'm following the guide here
https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TI/pages/2357592066/Running+NGINX+in+Crafting+with+Webpack+on+a+Laptop#Crafting-Sandbox-Setup

@Xindi Xu that's written under the context of a user using intercepted services (i.e. "This ensures `nginx` is running as an intercepted container in your sandbox") -- if you're developing with ppy then you shouldn't use `workspace` at all, sorry for the confusion!
gotcha. What should I run to turn it down? `workspace service disable webpack` ?
What about `cs down webpack` ? Do I need to run that or should I do the opposite?
nope, `workspace` will handle that for you
I can send API requests in my local envs now. Thank you!
Excellent, very glad to hear! @Alapan I'm still looking into your sandbox, will keep you posted on anything I find :slightly_smiling_face:
